EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mark, My name is Sara Conde and I am helping out Nicolette Taylor while she is away on vacatoin. If you would like to speak sooner than next week you may schedule a call via my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfERXu0Jk7K%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Otherwise you can keep your appoiment with Nicolette and she will call you when she returns. We look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfERXu0Jk7K%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfERXu0Jk7K%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfERXu0Jk7K%2B5O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: no-reply@timedriver.com <mailto:no-reply@timedriver.com> Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2012 9:33:58 AM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada) To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO Partners Conversation Appointment Confirmation Appointment Confirmation Invitee: Mark Clark (clarkmark7@gmail.com <mailto:clarkmark7@gmail.com>) Activity:MBO Partners Conversation Date:Thursday, July 5, 2012Time:10:00am EDT (45 minutes)Instructions: Call Mark at 757.619.7440 Question: Are there any special issues you would like to discuss on our call? Response: General discussion to review what I've learned from the web site. Mechanics of getting started, etc. Powered by TimeTrade <http://www.timetrade.com/email-powered-by.aspx>
